markdownRemark.excerpt: This is a collection of materials I accumulated to improve my essay writing in High School Chinese. It's a bank of ideas, phrases, and…
markdownRemark.html:
This is a collection of materials I accumulated to improve my essay writing in High School Chinese. It's a bank of ideas, phrases, and examples organized by common composition themes.

  • Composition Terminology: Key terms and literary devices.
  • Materials on Culture: Examples and ideas related to cultural topics.
  • Materials on Values: Exploring different values and beliefs.
  • Materials on Youth: Reflections on youth development.
